Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ohio/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago & Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago and Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ohio/Michigan
ShortDescription: Northbound 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago Avenue, Fairbanks & Illinois: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago Avenue, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
